website_summaries.verdict: An ideal entry-level Diesel watch at a less than $100 price point – just handle with care, as it scratches easily.
pros: Sleek, all-black design still “pops” with detail
Raised lip on the end of the watchband keeps it in place when fastening and unfastening
Smaller profile than most Diesel watches, making it great for office wear
cons: The poly watchband is uncomfortable in hot temperatures
Watch face scratches easily, and decorative material seems cheap

customer_reviews.title: This made a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit with my friend at Christmas! He wears it every single day. Note that the price on this fluctuates greatly but I think I got a good deal! He says it's very comfortable and he's able to wear it to work as a bartender so the water resistance must be good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Not seems original
customer_reviews.text: Not seems original. The strap looks very cheap. the number “4” on the dial is tilted to the left (look at the photo). Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vitalii

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, big and comfortable watch by Diesel
customer_reviews.text: the watch is beautiful. Red is my favorite color and this red looks great on the watch. The band is silicone which makes it noticeably more comfortable than my metal band watches. The price is good for such a quality big watch. One weird thing I didn't notice before purchase is that the watch doesn't show the date... oh well, I'm still happy. Thanks Diesel and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: JOSUE M.

customer_reviews.title: husband loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband for our first married Christmas :) He absolutely loves it! The face is a little larger than expected, but my husband still liked it and his opinion is the one that matters. He wears it to work, out to dinner, hanging with his friends... anywhere. He recently switched careers from manual labor to an office situation so this was his first watch and I was a little nervous. He was impressed with just the box, but he practically gasped when he saw the watch. So so happy with my purchase, and what a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Breanne

customer_reviews.title: Dirty watch
customer_reviews.text: Im not one to complain or write posts but the watch came in very dirty you may not see it in the photo but in person you can clearly see. The packaging was pretty bad and the bindings aren't made of aluminum it's made out of rubber which is a bummer all in all i paid $60 dollars for this watch and it is not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Xai

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch just a little dusty
customer_reviews.text: Arrived sooner than expected, packaging and item was in good condition except the fact the watch band was dirty. Dirt and dust all over the band. Much of been on the shelf for a while. Love the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Aj J.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish black watch you can read at night!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little watch, has luminescent hands which makes it easy at night and looks the part for almost any occasion. It's great that it handles showers (and even swims) while still ticking along - just don't push it. Treat it as a style watch rather than a work-horse and it'll go a long way
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Badass watch
customer_reviews.text: Simple design, good construction. The silicone strap is comfortable for all-day wearing and thus far has not faded or discolored. The larger face is bold and gets noticed. It fits my smaller sized wrists without looking over the top huge.. Worn it in the pool several times without problems. Bought it on Amazon for $65, which I found to be an amazing deal for a Diesel watch. I've had it for 6 months now and still receive compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: base14

customer_reviews.title: Extremely small band
customer_reviews.text: Admitting that I am larger that most.... still could just barely get the band to the first notch and that was tight. Compared it to other watches I own and ones of my wife, not sure this isn't intended for a lady despite it saying " Men's".
customer_reviews.author: Mary Noll

customer_reviews.title: Really stands out!
customer_reviews.text: I love the bright vivid red of this watch. Band could be a smidge longer for those of us who are normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McFarland

customer_reviews.title: nice watch gave it to the BF as a birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: nice watch gave it to the BF as a birthday gift. Since he is a man of 6'4" 260 the watch is a bit small for him.,
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: I give it five stars because the watch is beautiful, and I received it promptly
customer_reviews.text: I give it five stars because the watch is beautiful, and I received it promptly. But the watch has a dark stain of some kind. I should have returned it. My fault.
customer_reviews.author: DantheMan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Watch
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten lots of compliments on this watch. This face is a good size for my small wrists. It isn't small, but it's not huge like other watches (even other Diesel models I've tried on). I love the wristband, as it's a very comfortable rubber. I haven't worn the watch a lot yet, but I plan on getting lots of use out of it, and I'm very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. B.

customer_reviews.title: Diesel!
customer_reviews.text: Love the brand. This watch did not disappoint. Still tickin strong.
customer_reviews.author: DM ATX

customer_reviews.title: I did not like the quality of this watch
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the quality of this watch. This watch also came in a black box with black inside lining and when I opened it, it took forever to remove the black lint. I returned it to look for something else instead.
customer_reviews.author: Chene De Wet

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice watch but the crown on mine broke off.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch for about 3 years and used it once in a while. The crown broke off and I wish that happened when it was still under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Kid

customer_reviews.title: Watch is nice.
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what was advertised. Very nice watch face and very well put together. Only reason I gave 4 stars is because of shipping. I received it almost a week after it was expected and I wasn’t happy about that especially since it was a birthday gift. Product was good. Shipping wasn’t.
customer_reviews.author: James Becker

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I gave this watch as a gift. My boyfriend loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Williams

customer_reviews.title: This watch rocks
customer_reviews.text: I have had Diesel watches in the past and loved every one of them. This one is no different! Awesome watch. Looks great on. And the price is amazing. Sefinitely buy this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Tal

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical but very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of buying this product from another company besides Diesel. However, I received the product and was highly pleased. The product matches the description and was brand new. No scratches and runs perfectly. I received my order in a white Diesel box with the watch strapped to a small pillow. This was a gift for my boyfriend and he LOVES it. I would recommend highly because it's cheap and great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Diesel Makes a Good Watch
customer_reviews.text: I have several watches that very in price and quality. This is my third Diesel watch. This watch is well worth the price. The solid white makes it an eye catcher. It is large without being ridiculous. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jim wen

customer_reviews.title: Dude
customer_reviews.text: This watch is awesome. I get compliments on it all the time. I'm a big guy with bigger wrists so I liked the size of it because most normal size watches look feminine on my big frame. I wanted a bigger watch but not one of the ones that look like a Flava Flav clock on your wrist. Perfect. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: steven a. willard

customer_reviews.title: Best Diesel watch
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend gifted me this watch as Thanks giving gift and I just love this masterpiece. The red color is very bright and this overall combination of gunmetal with red looks amazing. If you like to wear different than others this watch os for you. The dial is huge and looks very tough and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Siddhesh Sawant

customer_reviews.title: It's a quality piece.....
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch!!!! Soft and bold,if that makes sense. It's the perfect watch for a big guy.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: Great watch but the wristband is like silicone and cheap looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright, big and bold
customer_reviews.text: Bright, big and bold. If you like bigger watches that are not too heavy this is a nice unit. You will definitely receive lots of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen of Brittimus Esq.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift. It is a nice watch. It could have had 2 more links in the armband. It is a snug fit on a man that is 6'7" 240 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Kesha

customer_reviews.title: Good watch overall
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch, but it occasionally stops keeping the correct time. Great watch overall though. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice timepiece
customer_reviews.text: Awesome timepiece! Got it for my father in law. I may have to get one for myself. Looks very classy and sharp! Comes in a cool box too.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Great looking strap and that's it !!!!
customer_reviews.text: The strap quality is awesome. I love leather straps looks classy. But the dial of the watch is okay. Nothing special to rave about. This was a request from my brother and couldn't say no, however for the money I paid. Diesel has better watches.
customer_reviews.author: sri harsha

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: ...but it did not fit my wrist which is my fault as I didn't measure my wrist before ordering. I do have a rather thick wrist and wish this would have fit. It looks great, has a comfortable rubber wrist band, and it's a shame I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Texas

customer_reviews.title: great price and great quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves to collect watches and is so picky, great price and great quality, pretty box, just great!!
customer_reviews.author: paula chaur

customer_reviews.title: One Point for Mom!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 19 year old son as a Christmas gift. It came in a really cool, expensive looking box on what appeared to be a leather pillow. He was impressed with the box so he was really impressed with the watch. He told me a few days later that everyone at work liked his watch a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch, the quality is great, feels nice to wear and the box is awesome, it arrived early as well
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: this watch is the best. simply perfection in every aspect
customer_reviews.text: this watch is the best. simply perfection in every aspect, the color, the size , the style. i would strongly recommend this to everyone .
customer_reviews.author: flip angel

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Watch came right as scheduled. Brand new in box and same bright red as photo. Comfortable watch to wear although I would recommend only wearing the watch when going out or on special occasions. Already have had multiple people complement the watch. Definitely a center piece to an outfit. Great ALL RED watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DIESEL WATCH
customer_reviews.text: It's not really what I expected. A little expensive but then again it may just be because of the DIESEL brand...who know?....
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Bad design on the crown, and looks cheap, but u get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The crown of the watch is extremely sharp, it cause serious irritation wearing this watch.
customer_reviews.author: PlatyPusheen

customer_reviews.title: Little GAS for your DIESEL
customer_reviews.text: what you pay for is what you get - Diesel Watches are know for their BIG appeal and no for small wrists. You should flaunt your BIG Daddy's. This one however is a decent entry level Diesel which will look great on you - They really are useful with your to your work/office.
customer_reviews.author: Viswanathan Renganathan

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. But the face is such a dark black ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. But the face is such a dark black that the watch is difficult to read unless in a very brightly lit area.
customer_reviews.author: Acamea

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT WATCH
customer_reviews.text: IT WAS A GIFT FOR SOMEONE AND HE LOVED IT
customer_reviews.author: kimesha clark

customer_reviews.title: fine looking watch for only delicate/light use
customer_reviews.text: VERY light weight which to me comes off as seemingly flimsy and not very durable. fine looking watch for only delicate/light use, but not for everyday wear in my opinion. i need to know the watch will last - therefore it has been returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch! The Red is very bright and you'll ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch! The Red is very bright and you'll get plenty of compliments when wearing it. This is my first Diesel watch but I doubt if it'll be my last. A stylish man's watch! Go big or go home!
customer_reviews.author: TheFourthWall

customer_reviews.title: Present for my son
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new watch I bought him for Christmas. I was surprised he liked the color white. He says he has had several people from his college that have complemented him on it. It is easy to read, keeps good time and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: M Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I loved how it was so nicely packaged. Its a very cool subdues watch. BF LOVED it and wears it all the time. We have had no problem with the wristband or anything like that. ENJOY!
customer_reviews.author: Britta

customer_reviews.title: A big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: One star is far too much to express my disappointment, I could give zero star if possible. The clock keeps falling behind time. I have to adjust the hour every time I decide to wear it. Truly recommend not buying.
customer_reviews.author: IT

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, moderate size watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband as a gift. The watch is a good size, not overly big. If you have bigger build, it may be a little small in size. Love the face of the watch
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Marie Hanson Skirka

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description
customer_reviews.text: The description displays that it's a 55mm case size. When actually it's only 50mm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and easy to wear. Love the color and size.
customer_reviews.author: Corinna A. Crosetto

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stylish blackout watch but get scratches fairly easy and the face is small not worth $100 unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Acornejo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT WATCH BUT LOOKS CHEAP IN PERSON. ALSO NOT AS BIG AS EXPECTED
customer_reviews.author: jaylee

customer_reviews.title: Product did not come in a white box. It ...
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come in a white box. It was black. There was black fuz stuck to the watch that you'd want to wipe off before gifting. Weird it wasn't in a white box. Watch was white.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Always complimented!
customer_reviews.text: This watch receives constant compliments! Everyone wants to know where it was purchased from. I was worried at first because in the box it looks like it heavily attracts lint and dust but out of the box I've had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Love the white..
customer_reviews.text: A very interesting looking watch. Gets some attention. Easy to read. A good unisex watch.
customer_reviews.author: Tap Notrub

customer_reviews.title: besides that tha watch is working a looks good
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than what i expected and the box seem to be open and the watch it self had a little bit of dirt but nothing much, besides that tha watch is working a looks good
customer_reviews.author: luis

customer_reviews.title: but thats how I like them.
customer_reviews.text: I get a ton of compliments on this watch. Its definitely a large watch, but thats how I like them.
customer_reviews.author: scott m schneider

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great looking watch. Very comfortable too. Nice size and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Really cool watch! The red color is bright and that's what I wanted. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! I bought for myself and it is a nice looking watch, red is very very bright and it's big. It came on a black box which was a nice touch cause it makes it stand out even more. Material is like a fushion between rubber and metal which is very nice. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: clock arrived too dirty it looks like it was already used
customer_reviews.text: The clock arrived on time and is very beautiful, but as you can see in the video came all dirty, looked used
customer_reviews.author: Renato

customer_reviews.title: Skye
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch. It was a birthday gift and recipient really liked it. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Pirate

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Wife, she gets so many compliments and never leaves the house without it. Its a mans size but looks Pimp.
customer_reviews.author: Kakdiesel1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch to wear in the gym. I'm thinking about buying the black variant soon.
customer_reviews.author: SagitTaurus

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but BIG
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking watch -- unfortunately for me, it was just too large. I do like and wear lots of larger watches and it is always difficult for me to tell how these larger watches will look until I get them on my wrist. I wish this one were just slightly smaller.
customer_reviews.author: chinook

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Already got a few complements my first time wearing it. It's bold and chunky and great for the summer. Looks very expensive too.
customer_reviews.author: Laugh or Go Crazy Show

customer_reviews.title: amazing watch
customer_reviews.text: i really love it this watch, all the diesel watches are avant garde on desing and style, but tyhey are no water purposes watches
customer_reviews.author: LUIS J CASTILLO Q

customer_reviews.title: Updated side fasteners
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive watch. I've received several compliments already, including a couple that noted it looked "fancy", which is impressive considering the low price. I wanted to point out the side fasteners on this watch, which you can see clearly in the product video. I was a bit worried about these because they are fairly large and I knew they would detract from the appearance of the watch. However, I'm happy to report that the watch now has updated side fasteners that are completely different. They are extremely tiny (perhaps 1/4 the size of the ones in the pictures/video), and are hardly noticeable at all. Love this watch!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dale Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and the quality is outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: Watch looks even better in person. It is of great quality and can look dressy as well as casual.
customer_reviews.author: Paola Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Gift box in picture is not what you get
customer_reviews.text: The watch was great- the only thing I was disappointed about was that the picture shows the white watch coming in a white box. I received the white watch in a black watch - just wanted it to match- other then that everything was great
customer_reviews.author: TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: The best watch I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant, it satisfies all my needs, this is exactly what I wanted. The only thing I consider it as a con is that, not date option is available, though I give it a 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mrazbette Kalamozous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice looking watch. But careful of its size. Its exactly same size and coke can top.
customer_reviews.author: Srikanth Anukula

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Great quality watch, I would give it 5 stars if it wasn't so small...I thought it would be a little bigger. On the functional side, very good. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio PL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Can be weare with formal or casual clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my husband and he totally loves it!!! It looks exactly as picture and great quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Fragile Band
customer_reviews.text: The watch is nice but the slide that holds the band splits and falls off.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my boyfriend and he loves it😍
customer_reviews.author: Bonita

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I got it as a gift for my nephew an he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Aneica

customer_reviews.title: thewatch was suppose to be color domination black/blue and does ...
customer_reviews.text: the watch was suppose to be color domination black/blue and does not show the blue on the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Brightest Red
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a Christmas gift and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTY

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: awesome awesome watch...when it arrived i was amazed that it is perfect haha i needed a watch that can be casual and at the same time for work and this fits the bill!! If u lke big watches this is the watch for you but i wont recommend it to people that is skinny with small wrists, it looks great on me because i am a big guy with big hands and i get alot of complimets wearing it
customer_reviews.author: robinbruin2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect watch!!
customer_reviews.text: It came super quick and it is the perfect size. I have gotten plenty of compliments on it, it goes with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks great and is a well built watch. My son wanted this watch and he loves it he is 17
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Tuccillo

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was an easy, timely, and great purchase. I purchased this as a gift for Christmas. It arrived on time and before Christmas. The recipient loved it. If I hadn't received a white Envicta of my own...I was going to buy another of these. I'm completely satisfied. -Stacey
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Stacey Dean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!
customer_reviews.text: It was just perfect as a gift for my 19 year old son. He absolutely LOVED it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good ítem
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good. Thank you very much for all about it. This item is really as I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos De la Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Clean and classic for a silicone watch.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a gift and he loves it. It is a clean simple design. Looks nice even though its silicone. He has had it for the past 9 months and the silicone is in great condition. The only issue is that it steams up inside the watch [probably started after about 4-5 months], so he will have to get it sent in to get a replacement. Good thing is there is a warranty on it. Hopefully the replacement doesn't do that.
customer_reviews.author: miyoun86

customer_reviews.title: High quality and looks great
customer_reviews.text: A little heavier than expected, but a high quality watch and looks great. Love the blue and brown combination.
customer_reviews.author: Super Dave

customer_reviews.title: Black on black watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch Diesel dz1437 it's a great looking watch would recommed it to anybody looking for a watch.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Knob on side is fragile
customer_reviews.text: The knob on side to adjust the time broke off, other then that it was a great watch. Just be gentle with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Butz

customer_reviews.title: Diesel Men's Watch
customer_reviews.text: Like it very much, will be a perfect gift for my son
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, it was just what I expected and is now my summer watch.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Gold

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this watch. It scratches so easily and has marks all over. The only good thing about it is the band. What a waste of money. The watch now looks 10 years old after a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: jaroslaw michalonek

customer_reviews.title: really good watch, it had too much dust when arrived ...
customer_reviews.text: it is black not blue, really good watch, it had too much dust when arrived but thats beacuse of the hole in the Diesel Box.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect and looks great. Feels comfortable and it's definitely water resistant.

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: Looks so good on me and it's Diesel and that price though!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my hubby for Fathers Day! He loves it! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dust magnet
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch today open it up and it like a dust ball in there. It took me at least 10 minutes to clean the watch bands.
customer_reviews.author: Sokphal Chhoeun

customer_reviews.title: Great watch highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch i loved it, it may just be a little bit too big for certain people besides that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: we both loved the design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my partner last Christmas. we both loved the design, but it should have lasted longer. in less than a year the paint chipped pretty significantly and the dial bent and pops out stopping the peice from keeping time. he did wear it almost every day but never did anything strenuous in it. Maybe it's just not an everyday watch.
customer_reviews.author: A-Game

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. It easy exactly what it looks like. Very comfortable as well and looks more expensive than what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Thompson

product_meta.title: Diesel Men's Double Down Stainless Steel Chronograph Quartz Watch
product_meta.description:
* Watch Sizing Guide
 * It's final: your countdown to cool is moments away when you wear this colossal Diesel® timepiece.
 * Stainless steel case with knurled edge.
 * Polyurethane strap with adjustable buckle closure.
 * Three-hand analog display with quartz movement.
 * Dial includes hour markers.
 * Minute track at dial perimeter.
 * Water resistant 50 meters/165 feet.
 * Measurements:  *  Case Height: 44 mm
    *  Case Width: 44 mm
    *  Case Depth: 11 mm
    *  Band Width: 25 2⁄5 mm
    *  Band Circumference/Length: 9 1⁄2 in
    *  Weight: 2 oz
   
   






PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :5.12 x 5.12 x 5.12 inches; 2.05 Ounces
 * Item model number :DZ1437
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 Lithium ion batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :May 19, 2011
 * Manufacturer :Diesel
 * ASIN :B0051QGCIW

    *  #42 inMen's Contemporary & Designer Watches
